00041 /* define standard lengths to use when converting */
00042 #define NITF_INT8_SZ  1
00043 #define NITF_INT16_SZ 2
00044 #define NITF_INT32_SZ 4
00045 #define NITF_INT64_SZ 8

00060 typedef enum _nitf_FieldType
00061 {
00062     NITF_BCS_A,                 /* Field is basic character set alphanumeric */
00063     NITF_BCS_N,                 /* Field is basic character set numeric  */
00064     NITF_BINARY                 /* Field is binary data */
00065 } nitf_FieldType;

00347 #define NITF_TRY_GET_UINT32(FIELD, DATA_PTR, error)                        \
00348     if (!nitf_Field_get(FIELD, DATA_PTR, NITF_CONV_UINT, NITF_INT32_SZ, error)) \
00349         goto CATCH_ERROR
00350 
00354 #define NITF_TRY_GET_UINT64(FIELD, DATA_PTR, error)        \
00355     if (!nitf_Field_get(FIELD, DATA_PTR, NITF_CONV_UINT,NITF_INT64_SZ, error)) \
00356         goto CATCH_ERROR
